issue.title: [Python] Enable arithmetic operations on Expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12058](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12058). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To make the dataset (projection) expressions more usable, we can add some more dunder methods to the class (like we already can do `expr == 1` for comparison operations, we can also enable arithmetic python operators.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12058?focusedCommentId=17317186) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9780
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9780>
